message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go as low as $130. Would you consider $140? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $137.50. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
